Class TrackAuthorDAO

java.lang.Object
app.tracktune.model.track.TrackAuthorDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO<TrackAuthor>
public class TrackAuthorDAO extends Object implements DAO<TrackAuthor>
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing associations between Tracks and Authors.

This class provides CRUD operations for the TrackAuthor entity, which represents a many-to-many relationship between tracks and authors in the database. It communicates with the "TracksAuthors" table.
